reviewText: Great DVD.  Just what you would expect from the author of Eat to Live.  Easy to follow, clear, concise, lots of usable info.  I lost 70 pounds in six months on his program, 85 overall in a year.  Easy to do, makes perfect sense.  His enthusiasm carries you along.
summary: Dr. Fuhrman is changing the world, one unhealthy person at a time.

reviewText: you can tell he WANTS to get funni! lol this is great dvd, we enjoyed the whole thing and will watch again. he covered quite a few veggies that i have seen at the market yet have not had the knowledge to buy and fix for myself. also since my mate is ... NEW ? at fixing his own food... lol i can tell that from watching this he feels much better about what he might want to contribute and his knowledge of how to do the stuff it takes to make a meal. now the test??? ... loli deeply appreciate joel fuhrman for being the person he is and i totally love to support ppl who are so enlivened by what they love to do that they happily share with all of us what they "know" and tis man knows... ALOT. we bought the eat to live book with this dvd as our intro to dr joel's work and we are getting ready to start the initial 6 week gig in a little bit, i am excited and VERY saisfied that this one dvd and the book (eat to live) are actually enough to "buy" and i have all i need to understand AND feel thrilled at what i have learned from him.i was "raw" for about a year a few years ago and eventually slid off that way of eating, mostly cause it just got to time comsuming to keep doing every darn thing from scratch, as well as ... well.. um it just seemed like i could never really just relax and EAT. lol (thats me mind you i adored the whole "idea" of a raw lifestyle) i love that dr fuhrman does not in ANY way lead you to the direction of a raw lifestyle, YET in many ways this is the perfect PERFECT blend of raw and not.im looking 4ward to years of great health eating this "way"

reviewText: I liked the way he covered the various greens and used the vita mixer to do various foods.  Once you view it, you probably will not view it again unless something specific you wanted to make that you saw.  I would suggest you get it at the library which usually carries these type of things.  If your library does not have it - then you just fill out  a slip and request and they will buy it for the patrons.

reviewText: The information you get from this DVD and all the other DR Fuhrman books is astounding and shocking. I bought 1 book because I saw a program on the Television and after reading that it was like discovering the real truth about eating. Then my Wife read it which lead us to get his other books. It is amazing how we grow up eating and thinking that was the normal way to eat. The way everything is explained made me realize that we should have been raised with this kind of knowledge because its so very true and simple. DR Fuhrman does not push any views on you, he just offers true knowledge of ways to eat and heal many ailments from eating the right foods. I really enjoyed all of the books and Great Recipes with my Wife and we both found that we look and feel better. You can eat Meat and Seafood if you want to which is something my Wife and I still do. This is not another Diet gimmick. In fact its not even a Diet! Its pure common sense!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This dvd, along with Dr. Fuhrman's book, "Eat to Live," motivated me to lose 20 lbs in a month and a half and lower my escalating blood sugar and blood pressure after almost passing out in a restaurant. I didn't even know that my blood sugar had been spiking that high! After reading all of the success stories about many other people losing hundreds of pounds without starving themselves and after being referred to Dr. Furhman's books and dvd's by my primary care doctor, I took the plunge. Over six months later, I have still maintained my new weight and made up my mind not to gain it back for the sake of my health. I look and feel 10 years younger. This dvd makes my mouth water every time I watch it and I feel like running down to Whole Foods to buy those luscious veggies! I gave this item 4 stars instead of 5 stars because not everyone can afford to shop at Whole Foods and spring for Dr. Furhman's salad dressings and other health products; but I go there every once in a while as a treat. Very inspirational!
